metadata.title: CVE-2020-17368 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Firejail through 0.9.62 mishandles shell metacharacters during use of the --output or --output-stderr option, which may lead to command injection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-17368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.62-4
firejail-profiles - 0.9.62-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.62-4').
